name: REViewer
title: REViewer
summary: REViewer (v0.2.7) is a tool for visualizing alignments of reads in regions containing tandem repeats.

inputSpec.name: reads_index
inputSpec.label: index for BAMlet generated by ExpansionHunter
inputSpec.help: Should have the same name as BAM file with .bai extension

inputSpec.name: reference_index
inputSpec.label: FASTA file index
inputSpec.help: Should have the same name as FASTA file with .fai extension

inputSpec.name: catalog
inputSpec.label: Variant catalog
inputSpec.help: Variant catalog defining repeat expansion loci (same as used by ExpansionHunter)

inputSpec.name: locus
inputSpec.label: Loci to analyze
inputSpec.help: Only loci with genotypes and from variant catalog will be accepted, comma separated (e.g. ATXN1,HTT)

inputSpec.name: region_extension_length
inputSpec.label: Region extension length
inputSpec.help: Length of region around repeat to examine, must be same as specified in ExpansionHunter

inputSpec.name: pdf
inputSpec.label: Output PDF
inputSpec.help: Upload output as PDF files (else SVG files will be uploaded)
